comment.author: 65688191@N00
comment._content:
I love taking pictures of pictures. 
A great way to hold on to the past.
This is a super example!
Too bad the id. is not available.

comment.author: 11998462@N08
comment._content: This is more than likely a Union soldier with a 4 button sack coat. His cartridge box sling has an eagle breast plate and probably an oval US belt buckle.
